title: The Hermit of Lammas Wood
description: Some journeys take you where you need to be.Tanyth Fairport makes her way through the Lammas Wood to discover the last of the Old Witch Women isn't exactly what she expected. When greedy businessmen from the mainland threaten those she loves, Tanyth must put aside her fear and give herself over to her gifts.A journey twenty winters in the making may come to naught when Tanyth learns the secret of The Hermit of Lammas Wood.
author: Nathan Lowell
